message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $115. It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a reasonable price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $100 for the product.

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your valuation of our product. I am unable to accept $100 as it doesn't reflect the true value. However, I am willing to negotiate further. How about we meet in the middle at $110?
Hello Alice, I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $105 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm glad we're getting closer to a fair price. Considering the value of the product, I believe we can agree on $107. Let me know if this works for you.
